rows.label: bf03310100_0020
rows.name:
Th-the color of that crystal!
You're...! Waaaaah!

rows.label: bf03310100_0030
rows.name:
Not good.
He'll be bringing others before long.

rows.label: bf03310100_0040
rows.name:
The rumors about Homura must have traveled pretty
far. Even grunts like him have heard 'em.

rows.label: bf03310100_0050
rows.name:
Sorry...
I guess I should have used the cloak...

rows.label: bf03310100_0070
rows.name: From what I hear, it's some fancy-pants Nopon merchant.

rows.label: bf03310100_0100
rows.name:
Uh?
Oh! Well, if it isn't Ion!

rows.label: bf03310100_0110
rows.name:
You grew a fair bit!
How's Grandpa Cole doing?

rows.label: bf03310100_0140
rows.name:
Uh? Ah, this is Ion. That old friend of mine
takes care of her.

rows.label: bf03310100_0150
rows.name: Hi, Ion. Great to meet you!

rows.label: bf03310100_0160
rows.name:
Come on.
Let's beat it before those soldiers show up.
